text:
$12.10 for this. Portion is ok, ordered big spicy but not super spicy. Not fragrant. But ok to eat.

Meat and veg all weigh tgt same price.

Worst mala I've ever eaten. No sichuan peppercorn fragrance at all, in place was a "curry instant noodles flavour packet" taste. Plain salty with no other flavours, I threw the whole serving away. Waiting time was long as well. Hope they improve.

Been ordering from this stall for delivery. Get from medium spicy onwards. This was $20 worth but lately, the portion seemed to be dwindling. My orders are always intestine, bamboo shoot, 3 types of vege and two meats. All 100 gms each.

Convey in mandarin and chinese in a few time.  中辣 *少油*  im the only customer and yet. When i reach home ..open up and all i saw is a load of vegetables in a pot of oil  .....taste more like indian curry rather than Mala. Will never recommend anyone. Waiting time is always long too...so i heard. Wont go back

Recently got a takeaway from IMM. firstly the staffs were very friendly and helpful when i was choosing my dishes, the food was also cooked just right especially the potato which i find is very different from the others i have tried so far. Would definitely recommend for others to try out.
